titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee in Finance.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee in Finance.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Committee on Finance ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Grassley. Without written report.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on February 24, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Finance for the 108th Congress.
